Headline: Next Level Engineers | Accountability Coaching For Upskilling & Ambitious Goals
Comment:
Dilip Kumar will easily hit this goal.

Three reasons why?

1. He has a strong why. A very, very strong WHY. Anyone following his posts will know this. Dilip is passionate about fitness, passionate about helping founders, passionate about India's growth. His work is like waking up into his IKIGAI every single day. This is a great fuel to overcome any and many big obstacles along the way. 

2. He is around the right people. In fact one of THE BEST people in India for this particular field i.e Rainmatter by Zerodha (backed by Nithin Kamath)

3. If you observe the post, it aligns quite well with the effective SMART Goal setting framework i.e Specific, Measurable, Attainable, Relatable, Time Bound. 

SPECIFIC: Create a community of founders¬†in India, who lift weights & runs a few days a week.

MEASURABLE: 100 founders

ATTAINABLE: Definitely attainable because he already the ball rolling. He is doing meet ups across cities which are getting filled like crazy. He already did a amazing meet up in Bangalore. He has 90K followers on LinkedIn and writes regularly.  

RELTABLE: Obvious as stated and look at this bio (Entrepreneur | Rainmatter | Endurance athlete)

TIME BOUND: He wants to do this end of 2025. Clear timeline.

ATB Dilip
